document.full_text: zte corp, china's no.2 telecommunications equipment maker, has filed a lawsuit against larger chinese rival huawei technologies co ltd in china, it said on friday, a day after it was sued by the latter in europe.
document.title: zte sues huawei in china for patent infringement
lines_and_colors: zte corp, china's no.2 telecommunications equipment maker, has filed a lawsuit against larger chinese rival huawei technologies co ltd in china, it said on friday, a day after it was sued by the latter in europe.
